Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Histology \His*tol"o*gy\, n. [Gr. "isto`s tissue + -logy.] That branch of biological science, which treats of the minute (microscopic) structure of animal and vegetable tissues; -- called also {histiology}. [1913 Webster]
histology n : the branch of biology that studies the microscopic structure of animal or plant tissues
